title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Vector spaces and linear algebra: Linear independence, basis, norms, inner product spaces, Cauchy-Schwarz inequality, orthogonality, projections, Leastsquare filtering, MMSE estimation, Wiener filtering, Linear operators and matrix inverses, Matrix factorizations- LU, QR, Eigenvalues and eigenvectors, diagonalization of matrices, KL Transform, PCA, SVD, Toeplitz, Circulant matrices and their properties Case study: Face recognition by eigenfaces Estimation theory: Maximum-likelihood principle, Cramer-Rao bound, Maximum aposteriori (MAP) estimation, Kalman filter, extensions such as EKF, UKF, Particle filter Case study: Tracking objects/people in videos.Optimization theory: Gradient-descent, conjugate-gradient, Simulated annealing, graph cuts, loopy belief propagation, EM algorithm, Theory of constrained optimization, Lagrange multipliers, Dynamic programming, Viterbi algorithm, Hidden Markov models, Gaussian mixture modelsCase study: Image de-noising, inpainting, stereo disparity computation, speech/speaker recognition
